AI Research Lab

Future Ethics investigates the relationship between people and computers, between society and AI. We research AI safety and work on projects with companies that want to make AI safer in healthcare, law and finance.

Explore Our Research →

We study human-AI decision making, AI safety in critical sectors, and practical AI alignment. Our work bridges academic research and industry implementation.

See Our Projects →

We partner with healthcare systems, legal organizations, and financial institutions to implement AI safety frameworks and conduct real-world safety assessments.
